page.title: 10THE AMBULANCE SERVICE.
page.content: There is no{hospital or surgery}in our block.If you were to have an accident, the nearest hospital is at Alnwick, {three miles}away.Our block is served by two ambulance stations,one at Alnwick and the other at Broomhill. There are{4 ambulances}at Alnwick,two of which are fully-equipped emergency ambulances.There is a domestic ambulance used to take people to hospital and a tail-lift domestic ambulance for day hospials.There are {14}men who share three,8-hour shifts. It takes the ambulance from Alnwick{7 {minutes}to get to our block, and they are called there about six times each month.There are{three ambulances}at Broomhill,and only four men.There are 2 men on standby from 4.0pm to 8.0am.
